scripts.lint: cd contract && cargo fmt && cargo clippy
scripts.deploy: yarn build:contract && cd contract && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/nft_rental.wasm
scripts.deploy_testnet: yarn build:contract && cd contract && near deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/nft_rental.wasm --accountId nft-rental.testnet
scripts.deploy_mainnet: yarn build:contract && cd contract && NEAR_ENV=mainnet near deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/nft_rental.wasm --accountId nft-rental.near
scripts.deploy:demo_nft: yarn build:demo_nft && cd demo_nft_contract && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/tamagotchi.wasm
scripts.deploy_testnet:demo_nft: yarn build:demo_nft && cd demo_nft_contract && near deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/tamagotchi.wasm --accountId tamagotchi-nft.testnet
scripts.build:contract: cd contract && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:demo_nft: cd demo_nft_contract && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.test:integration: yarn build:contract && cd integration-tests && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cargo test --test integration -- --nocapture
scripts.test:gas: yarn build:contract && yarn build:demo_nft && cd integration-tests && cargo test --test gas_usage -- --nocapture
scripts.deps-install: yarn install && cd frontend && yarn install && cd ..
scripts.deps-install:demo_web: yarn install && cd demo_nft_frontend && yarn install && cd ..
